title: Polestar 2 electric cars receive update to Android Automotive 11
content:
Android Automotive is Google’s custom build of Android intended to power car infotainment systems. Unlike Android Auto, it doesn’t rely on a connected smartphone, which means it has to be updated as if it was a smartphone or tablet itself. The Polestar 2 was one of the first cars to ship with Android Automotive, and

The post Polestar 2 electric cars receive update to Android Automotive 11 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Polestar 2 electric car is being updated to Android Automotive 11, even though Android Automotive 12 is already available.
